Package camzup.pfriendly

Interface ITextDisplay2

All Superinterfaces:
ITextDisplay
All Known Implementing Classes:
Up3, Yup2, Yup3, YupJ2, Zup3
public interface ITextDisplay2
extends ITextDisplay
Maintains consistent behavior between 2D renderers which display text to the screen.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    default void text​(char[] chars, int start, int stop, float x, float y, float z)
    Displays an array of characters at a 2D location.
    default void text​(char c, float x, float y, float z)
    Displays a character as text at a 2D location.
    default void text​(float real, float x, float y, float z)
    Displays a real number as text at a 2D location.
    default void text​(int i, float x, float y, float z)
    Displays an integer as text at a 2D location.
    default void text​(java.lang.String str, float x, float y, float z)
    Displays a string of text at a 2D location.

    Methods inherited from interface camzup.pfriendly.ITextDisplay

    text, text, text, text, text, text, text, text, text, text, text, text

  • Method Details

    • text

      default void text​(char c, float x, float y, float z)
      Displays a character as text at a 2D location. Ignores the z coordinate.
      Parameters:
      c - the character
      x - the x coordinate
      y - the y coordinate
      z - the z coordinate

    • text

      default void text​(char[] chars, int start, int stop, float x, float y, float z)
      Displays an array of characters at a 2D location. Ignores the z coordinate.
      Parameters:
      chars - the character array
      start - the start index, inclusive
      stop - the stop index, exclusive
      x - the x coordinate
      y - the y coordinate
      z - the z coordinate

    • text

      default void text​(float real, float x, float y, float z)
      Displays a real number as text at a 2D location. Ignores the z coordinate. Registers up to four decimal places.
      Parameters:
      real - the real number
      x - the x coordinate
      y - the y coordinate
      z - the z coordinate
      See Also:
      Utils.toFixed(float, int)

    • text

      default void text​(int i, float x, float y, float z)
      Displays an integer as text at a 2D location. Ignores the z coordinate. Registers up to four decimal places.
      Parameters:
      i - the integer
      x - the x coordinate
      y - the y coordinate
      z - the z coordinate

    • text

      default void text​(java.lang.String str, float x, float y, float z)
      Displays a string of text at a 2D location. Ignores the z coordinate.
      Parameters:
      str - the string
      x - the x coordinate
      y - the y coordinate
      z - the z coordinate
